If you're interested in new treatments, ask your doctor about ongoing clinical trials for AAT deficiency.",NHLBI,Alpha-1 Antitrypsin Deficiency
How to prevent Alpha-1 Antitrypsin Deficiency ?,"You can't prevent alpha-1 antitrypsin (AAT) deficiency because the condition is inherited (passed from parents to children through genes).
                
If you inherit two faulty AAT genes, you'll have AAT deficiency. Even so, you may never develop one of the diseases
